name: Keep the Fire Alive (dexahtm)
description:
-- WEB BUILD DOESN'T WORK DUE TO GODOT 4?? AND ITCH CANVAS CONFIG. -- Sorry about this, hopefully itch fixes this or godot. Either one. So I can make my games more accessible to everyone :D

Linux build is tested and works

Windows build is untested not sure if it works

Instructions: Hit space to collect the logs and prevent the campfire from falling into the abyss of space.

This game was made very fastly (1:30)

I am a VERY amateur game developer and this is my first game jam. Also my first game on Itch. I know it honestly isn't very great, but it's my first and i learned a lot from it. It was fun.
